page.title: 14The Boys Brigade. by S. Hall
page.content: The{Boys Brigade}meet on Mondays at 5.45 p.m.to 7.45 p.m. Our uniform is a blue jumper with badge,a blue hat, black trousers, dark socks, black shoesand an armband.We do achievements to gain badges. We have six badges white, green, purple, blue,red and gold. In the summer instead of staying in the hall we go to{Bell Vue}field to play cricket and rounders.When we meet in the hall in uniform we have a hymn, fall out and get changed, have achievements, games, have groupwork and then everyone goes in the hall for games. Every we have an annual at Newbiggin by the sea. Occasionally we have bonanza weekends We have trips to {Light Water}Valley.The Boys Brigade is very good and fills in your spare time and i enjoy going.
